channel.title: Pk points ftw? help plox
channel.description: Ok well i would like someone to please show me where to look or to help me to adding a pk point shop example: shop that takes only pk points for items. and also recieve a pk point per kill on a person in wildy example: you have defeated taylor you recieve 1 pk point.

item.title: Pk points ftw? help plox
item.dc:creator: @ameer122 ameer122
item.description:
@ameer122 wrote:

search for slot

and you will see like this

if (Slot == -1 && MyShopID != 8 && MyShopID != 19 && MyShopID != 1 && MyShopID != 36 && MyShopID != 35 && MyShopID != 3) { sM("You don't have enough coins."); break; }

under it add

if (Slot3 == -1 && MyShopID == 1) { sM("You don't have enough PK points."); break; }

and now search for

if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) {

you will see this

[code=java] if (MyShopID != 8 && MyShopID != 19 && MyShopID != 36 && MyShopID != 1 && MyShopID != 35) {
if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {

                        deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), TotPrice2);
                        addItem(itemID, 1);
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        }
                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                        break;
                    }
                } else {
                    sM("Not enough coins for this item.");
                }[/code]

after the

}

add this

if (MyShopID == 1) { if (pkPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0){ pkPoints -= TotPrice2; addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough PK points for this item."); } }

Read full topic
